titleInfo.title: Printed circular no.4322 of 1853 from J. G. Lumsden, Secretary to Government, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The circular relates to complimentary addresses being made to public officers on the occasion of their retirement or removal from office, stating that such practice should be ‘systematically discouraged’.
